AxMacroDictionary.Name: VendInvoiceFaults
AxMacroDictionary.Source: // // These macros are used to specify the SubCode on AifFaults. // Their values will not be translated allowing the consumer of the service to identify the cause // of the fault and take appropriate action. // #DEFINE.ValidationFailed('ValidationFailed') #DEFINE.OrigPurchIdNotFound('OrigPurchIdNotFound') #DEFINE.InvoiceCurrencyDifferentFromPoCurrency('InvoiceCurrencyDifferentFromPoCurrency') #DEFINE.InvoiceAccountDoesNotMatchCorrespondingPo('InvoiceAccountDoesNotMatchCorrespondingPo') #DEFINE.MissingPurchId('MissingPurchId') #DEFINE.LineQtyCannotBeZero('LineQtyCannotBeZero') #DEFINE.ItemIdDoesNotMatchCorrespondingPo('ItemIdDoesNotMatchCorrespondingPo') #DEFINE.InventTransIdNotFoundOnCorrespondingPo('InventTransIdNotFoundOnCorrespondingPo') #DEFINE.MarkupMustBeCustVend('MarkupMustBeCustVend') #DEFINE.CurencyCodeDoesNotExist('CurencyCodeDoesNotExist') #DEFINE.MiscChargesPerUnitNotAllowed('MiscChargesPerUnitNotAllowed') #DEFINE.OrderLineMustOriginateFromSalesOrderLine('OrderLineMustOriginateFromSalesOrderLine') #DEFINE.IntercompanyPctOnlyAllowedOnIntercompanyOrderLines('InterCompanyPctOnlyAllowedOnInterCompanyOrderLines') #DEFINE.MiscChargeDoesNotExist('MiscChargeDoesNotExist') #DEFINE.MiscChargesOnItemCannotBeUsed('MiscChargesOnItemCannotBeUsed') #DEFINE.QtyAndNetAmountHaveOppositeSigns('QtyAndNetAmountHaveOppositeSigns') #DEFINE.InvoiceQtyAndOrderQtyHaveOppositeSigns('InvoiceQtyAndOrderQtyHaveOppositeSigns') #DEFINE.MissingInvoiceNumber('MissingInvoiceNumber') #DEFINE.InvalidPaymId('InvalidPaymId') #DEFINE.PendingInvoiceNeedsInvoiceNumber('PendingInvoiceNeedsInvoiceNumber') #DEFINE.ZeroExchRate('ZeroExchRate') #DEFINE.ZeroSecondaryRate('ZeroSecondaryRate') #DEFINE.PurchaseOrderNotInvoiceable('PurchaseOrderNotInvoiceable') #DEFINE.UnitPriceOrLineAmountMustBeSupplied('UnitPriceOrLineAmountMustBeSupplied') #DEFINE.PurchLineIsFullyInvoiced('PurchLineIsFullyInvoiced') #DEFINE.InvalidHeaderMarkup('InvalidHeaderMarkup') #DEFINE.InterCompanyPurchaseOrderNotSupported('InterCompanyPurchaseOrderNotSupported') #DEFINE.SubLineQtyCannotBeZero('SubLineQtyCannotBeZero') #DEFINE.TaxCodeDoesNotExist('TaxCodeDoesNotExist') #DEFINE.DuplicateTaxCode('DuplicateTaxCode') #DEFINE.NonPOLineCannotBeStocked('NonPOLineCannotBeStocked') #DEFINE.MissingIntrastatPort('MissingIntrastatPort') #DEFINE.MissingItemOrCategory('MissingItemOrCategory') #DEFINE.InvalidPostalLocation('InvalidPostalLocation') #DEFINE.DeliveryAddressCanNotBeProvided('DeliveryAddressCanNotBeProvided')
